name: Loft Bathroom Set
description: Set in the loft style for the bathroom. The BetON sink, Sonoma Forge mixer, Pottery Barn hangers. Cosmetics L: A Bruket and Herbivore Botanicals. Polys: 700 461 Verts: 615 011 In the archive scene 3ds max 2014 and the file obj. Materials for Corona. On all towels Turbosmuth (Render Iterations). To remove the logos from the tree, it's enough to assign ID # 1 to all polygons or apply the first material (wood) from Multi / Sub-Object to the whole object.
short_description:
Platform:	 3dsMax 2014 + obj
Render:	 Corona
Size:	 98 MB
Style:	 Ethnic
Materials:	 Metal, Fabric
